meanings.sent1: The backpack with the strappiest design can hold all my books.
meanings.sent2: She chose the strappiest sandals to wear on her hike.
meanings.sent3: The strappiest purse I own is so heavy, it feels like I'm carrying bricks.
meanings.sent4: Her strappiest dress made her look like a walking advertisement for a fashion brand.
meanings.sent5: The strappiest guitar case in the store caught my eye with its unique design.

meanings.sent1: Out of all her shoes, the strappiest pair were her favorite.
meanings.sent2: The strappiest belt in his collection was perfect for holding up his pants.
meanings.sent3: She joked that her strappiest hat made her look like a fashionable scarecrow.
meanings.sent4: The strappiest watch she owned was a gift from her grandfather.
meanings.sent5: The strappiest backpack in the store had so many compartments, it was like a mini closet.
